body_html: Hi! I completely forgot to share the solution, very sorry for that. It seems like you need to use tf.contrib.metrics instead of tf.metrics which doesn't support eager execution correctly for some reason... It worked for me at least, tell me if it solves your problem as well!
body_text: Hi! I completely forgot to share the solution, very sorry for that. It seems like you need to use tf.contrib.metrics instead of tf.metrics which doesn't support eager execution correctly for some reason... It worked for me at least, tell me if it solves your problem as well!
body: Hi! I completely forgot to share the solution, very sorry for that. It seems like you need to use `tf.contrib.metrics` instead of `tf.metrics` which doesn't support eager execution correctly for some reason... It worked for me at least, tell me if it solves your problem as well!
